alert.note: Alert for Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 2:09PM CDT until August 29 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Central and eastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 208 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Springfield, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Springfield... Strafford... Bassville... Northview... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 75 and 97. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
